Hymn.Arabic: "  22- لتكن يا رب رحمتك علينا حسبما انتظرناك.
Hymn.English: 22 Let Your mercy, O Lord, be upon us, Just as we hope in You.

Hymn.Arabic: 18- هوذا عين الرب على خائفيه الراجين رحمته  "
Hymn.English: 18 Behold, the eye of the Lord is on those who fear Him, On those who hope in His mercy,.
